title: Wellness Holiday in India a New Way to Good Health Through Natural Healing Techniques
text:
Wellness Holiday in India a New Way to Good Health Through Natural Healing Techniques Wellness Holiday in India a New Way to Good Health Through Natural Healing Techniques 0 
A wellness holiday in India is the best way to rejuvenate the body, mind and spirit in a completely natural manner. An Indian wellness journey is an awe inspiring journey which enriches a person's life substantially while leading him towards spiritual, physical and emotional well-being. Unlike the Western school of thought, Indian wellness and healing packages follow a more holistic approach. The very word holistic has been derived from the word whole; thus you can understand that ancient Indian healing techniques treats the body as a whole and does not look into it as a combination of smaller parts. It is their firm belief that a portion of the body cannot function properly without the other parts working in perfect tandem with it. To put it in a more elaborate way, we can say that an Indian wellness holiday plan would be a journey through the body, mind and soul in a serene environment blessed by nature to its fullest. Till date, a lot of emphasis has been put on the triad of mind, body and soul in relation to the concept of wellness. Now, the concept of surroundings holds an equally important position. The mind, body and spirit reacts to the surroundings in which it has been put to; thus the backdrop of a wellness program holds prime importance. 
The Indian wellness tours are a combination of luxury and austerity. The subjects are made to follow a strict daily routine which includes a proper diet, rest, meditation and medication. The very mention of discipline during a leisure trip should not dissuade a potential traveller since the austerities would be well balanced with fun and leisure. A typical journey at an Indian wellness centre would begin with a discourse on the human existence with a significant emphasis on the functioning of the chakras. It would be gradually followed up with meditation, spa, diet control and sleep. The unique wellness journey at an Indian wellness centre does not stop with the end of the holiday. It imbibes a strong sense of discipline, self-control and self-realization within a person which is expected to be carried for a lifetime. The westerners have taken strong interest in Indian wellness and healing programs since this land has held timeless secrets on natural well-being. Traditional Indian herbs have miraculous healing properties capable of resolving the toughest of medical complications on correct application and usage. The usage of authentic Indian herbs is a characteristic of Indian wellness and healing holidays, and is one of the most powerful components of the complete healing process. As the days pass by in the Indian wellness centre, the subject would feel a greater sense of peace, harmony and an over-whelming oneness with the universe. The ecstasy of such spiritual triumphs is impossible to fathom with words; it needs to be experienced through the depths of one's soul. 
To get the best deals on Indian wellness resorts, a thorough research needs to be conducted first. Prospective travellers can also take the assistance of wellness tour planners and guides to get the best wellness packages within a defined budget. Being the cradle of natural holistic healing, Ayurveda, naturopathy, Panchatantra and chakra healing, India has become the biggest hub for healing tourism. Rate this Article
